SCTX:
Begin dreamerWorkerScript

;makes the workers disappear if they're dead and the heart is destroyed

short doOnce
;global short DestroyBlight

if ( doOnce == 0 )
	if ( HeartDestroyed == 1 )
		SetHealth 0
		Set doOnce to 1
	endif

	if ( GetDeadCount "dagoth_ur_2" > 0 )
		SetHealth 0
		Set doOnce to 1
	endif
endif

if ( doOnce != 2 )
	if ( DestroyBlight == -1 )
		Disable
		Set doOnce to 2
	endif
endif

End
